text:
@Javedakhtarjadu Utterly bizarre!
Testing criteria has been diluted and this fella is busy kissing ass?

The BMC has decided to change its testing protocol for Covid-19. Now, asymptomatic contacts of patients will no longer be tested, even if they are high risk.

https://t.co/tCqhEoXo95
